## fishyplots

[![DOI](https://zenodo.org/badge/1012008498.svg)](https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.15932836)

This repository is a collection of plotting functions for the [Pacific
Groundfish Data Synopsis Shiny
app](https://github.com/DFO-NOAA-Pacific/shinyfishyplots), led by [Zoe
Khan](https://github.com/ZoeKhan1) and [Callie
Murakami](https://github.com/calmurakami).

The concept and code are heavily inspired by Fisheries and Oceans
Canada’s annual [Pacific Groundfish Data Synopsis
Reports](https://github.com/pbs-assess/gfsynopsis) and the paper:

Anderson, S.C., Keppel, E.A., and Edwards, A.M. 2020. Reproducible
visualization of raw fisheries data for 113 species improves
transparency, assessment efficiency, and monitoring. Fisheries 45:
535–543. <https://doi.org/10.1002/fsh.10441>
\[[PDF](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1-eLZFvEK9FxrKJPQ-AiojI30siYyfrUr/view?usp=sharing)\].

This work also builds off of initial NOAA implementation from 2024 of
the synopsis report concept by [Chantel
Wetzel](https://github.com/DFO-NOAA-Pacific/gfsynopsis-noaa) and [Matt
Callahan](https://github.com/MattCallahan-NOAA/gapproductssynopsis).

### Installation:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("DFO-NOAA-Pacific/fishyplots")
```

# Package index

## All functions

- [`afsc_bio`](https://dfo-noaa-pacific.github.io/fishyplots/reference/afsc_bio.md)
  : afsc_bio: Biological data for AFSC survey
- [`age_frequency()`](https://dfo-noaa-pacific.github.io/fishyplots/reference/age_frequency.md)
  : Plots distribution of ages across survey years.
- [`ak_survey_lengths`](https://dfo-noaa-pacific.github.io/fishyplots/reference/ak_survey_lengths.md)
  : ak_survey_lengths: length count data from AFSC surveys
- [`all_catch`](https://dfo-noaa-pacific.github.io/fishyplots/reference/all_catch.md)
  : all_catch: Catch data (occurrences) for all surveys/regions
- [`all_dbi`](https://dfo-noaa-pacific.github.io/fishyplots/reference/all_dbi.md)
  : Dataset of design based biomass indices for all science centers
- [`fishmap()`](https://dfo-noaa-pacific.github.io/fishyplots/reference/fishmap.md)
  : Function for modeled CPUE map based on prediction data
- [`length_frequency()`](https://dfo-noaa-pacific.github.io/fishyplots/reference/length_frequency.md)
  : Function to plot length frequency of fish species
- [`length_ts()`](https://dfo-noaa-pacific.github.io/fishyplots/reference/length_ts.md)
  : Main function to plot mean lengths over time by sex
- [`length_weight()`](https://dfo-noaa-pacific.github.io/fishyplots/reference/length_weight.md)
  : Main function to plot length-weight relationships by sex
- [`lw_predictions`](https://dfo-noaa-pacific.github.io/fishyplots/reference/lw_predictions.md)
  : lw_vb_fit_doc: Documentation of lw and vb predictions
- [`nwfsc_bio`](https://dfo-noaa-pacific.github.io/fishyplots/reference/nwfsc_bio.md)
  : nwfsc_bio: Biological data for NWFSC survey
- [`pbs_bio`](https://dfo-noaa-pacific.github.io/fishyplots/reference/pbs_bio.md)
  : pbs_bio: Biological data for PBS survey
- [`plot_age_depth()`](https://dfo-noaa-pacific.github.io/fishyplots/reference/plot_age_depth.md)
  : Function for age-depth plot
- [`plot_dbi()`](https://dfo-noaa-pacific.github.io/fishyplots/reference/plot_dbi.md)
  : Function and formatted data to plot design based index
- [`plot_growth()`](https://dfo-noaa-pacific.github.io/fishyplots/reference/plot_growth.md)
  : plot von Bertalanffy function predictions
- [`plot_length_depth()`](https://dfo-noaa-pacific.github.io/fishyplots/reference/plot_length_depth.md)
  : Function for length-depth plot
- [`plot_stan_dbi()`](https://dfo-noaa-pacific.github.io/fishyplots/reference/plot_stan_dbi.md)
  : Function and formatted data to plot standardized design based index
- [`predictions_afsc`](https://dfo-noaa-pacific.github.io/fishyplots/reference/predictions_afsc.md)
  : Modeled prediction data for AFSC region
- [`predictions_nwfsc`](https://dfo-noaa-pacific.github.io/fishyplots/reference/predictions_nwfsc.md)
  : Modeled prediction data for NWFSC region
- [`predictions_pbs`](https://dfo-noaa-pacific.github.io/fishyplots/reference/predictions_pbs.md)
  : Modeled prediction data for PBS region
- [`survey_table()`](https://dfo-noaa-pacific.github.io/fishyplots/reference/survey_table.md)
  : Main function to display survey specimen counts
- [`vb_predictions`](https://dfo-noaa-pacific.github.io/fishyplots/reference/vb_predictions.md)
  : Alternate data storage for von Bertalanffy predictions
- [`vonb_growth()`](https://dfo-noaa-pacific.github.io/fishyplots/reference/vonb_growth.md)
  : von Bertalanffy growth function plot

  biology](https://dfo-noaa-pacific.github.io/fishyplots/articles/a2_plotting_biology.md):
